sourcesContent:
{{ points }} Points
 import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from "@angular/core"; import { IUser } from "app/entities/user/user.model"; import { GeneralService } from "app/general.service"; import { Subscription } from "rxjs"; import { PointsDataService } from "./points-display.service"; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-points-display', templateUrl: './points-display.component.html', styleUrls: ['./points-display.component.scss'] }) export class PointsDisplayComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { user!: IUser; points = 0; subscription!: Subscription; constructor(private generalService: GeneralService, private pointsData: PointsDataService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.subscription = this.pointsData.currentPoint.subscribe(points => { this.points = points; }); this.generalService.findWidthAuthorities().subscribe(u => { this.user = u.body!; if (this.user.points) { this.points = this.user.points; } }); } ngOnDestroy(): void { this.subscription.unsubscribe(); } }
